World's Weirdest Restaurants takes you to a roadhouse in Florida...
...where you can eat exotic game or feed it.
I've seen some wild menus before, but not quite as literal as this.
We'll travel to a cafe in Japan where maids are the masters.
Then, we'll head to Vancouver for culinary matchmaking.
If you can mix food with romance, why not.
There's no question that the dating game, you got it.
And finally, we'll travel to the American Midwest with the clear alibi.
Every time you turn a corner, you expect to run into Dr. No.
